prizeListMission1:
For their services to protecting London, the first Crime Fighter that finds the location of the Viper will be rewarded with all of the following:

- Mafia Bike 20 inch BMX
- Exclusive HG winner t-shirt
- £100 cash
- £50 bonus cash for wearing a superhero clothing item

Runner-up prizes are also available.

Good luck, Crime Fighter. London is depending on you.
emailMission1:
The Viper has been spotted by Trafalgar Square. He is on to us, so you have only a few minutes. Go capture him before he escapes.

Good luck, Crime Fighter. All of London is depending on you...
revealcluesMission1: Here are the clue answers for Mission One

intro:
This is your first clue, Crime Fighter.

Good luck finding the Viper. The whole of London is depending on you!
